Translations.Text: What you are promised of is utterly nonsense
There is nothing but our life in this world. We die and we live. And we shall not be raised again
He is none other than a man who has forged a lie against Allah. And we are not going to believe in him
He (the Messenger) said, "O my Lord, help me! For, they have rejected me
Allah said, "Soon they shall be regretful
So the divine punishment caught up with them fairly and squarely. And We turned them into rubble. And so, the wicked people perished
Then We raised, after them, other generations
They cannot bring about the end of a community before the appointed time, nor can they delay it

Then We sent Our Messengers one after another. Whenever their Messenger came to a people, they denied he was the divine Messenger sent to them. So We made one community succeed another to doom and We got them mentioned in tales. And so, people, who believed not, perished
And then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron, with Our signs and a clear mandate
We sent them to Pharaoh and his chieftains, but they behaved haughtily and they were an egoist people
And they said, "What! Shall we believe in two men like us and their people are in our service
So they rejected the two and became of those who were destroyed
And We did give Moses the Book to guide them
And We made the son of Mary and his mother a sign. And We gave them shelter on a lofty quiet ground with springs
Allah told every Messenger, "Eat of the things that are good and wholesome, and act righteously. I do indeed know what you do
And, indeed, this community of yours, is one single community. And I am the Lord of you all! Do take due heed of Me, then
But they divided themselves into communities pursuing different ways scripturewise. People of every sect are happy with what they have
So leave them with their delusions for a while
Do they think that by helping them with wealth and children
We are giving good things to them in a hurry? Nay, they do not perceive (that Allah is only testing them therewith)
Indeed those that are, out of fear of their Lord, on their guard against evil
And those that believe in the Verses/signs of their Lord
And those that do not worship anything or anyone other than their Lord
And those that give what they should, with their hearts apprehending that they are bound to return to their Lord some day
Those are the ones that hasten to do good things and they are in the forefront in doing them
And We do not lay on anyone a burden except to the extent he/she can bear. And with Us is a Book that speaks the truth. And they shall not be wronged
Nay, they are deluded about this. And, besides, they have other things to do
Until, when We punish the affluent among them, they cry foul
Cry not this day! You shall indeed not be given any help from Us
My Verses were certainly recited to you, but you used to turn back on your heels
To ridicule the Verses in nocturnal confabulations
Is it then that they do not understand the Word, or is it that there has come to them that which did not come to their forefathers
Or, are they not acquainted with their Messenger, and so they deny him?h
Or do they say he is possessed? Nay! He has brought them the Truth, and most of them are averse to the Truth

And should the Truth follow their passions, there would certainly be chaos in the heavens and the earth and in everything therein. But We have brought them their Reminder, and from their Reminder they turn aside
Or, do you ask them for recompense? But the recompense of your Lord is the best! And He is the best of those who provide sustenance
And you do indeed invite them to the Straight Path
And those who do not believe in the Hereafter do indeed deviate from the Path
